argument.description: An expression that specifies the string to be searched through.
An expression that specifies the string to be searched through.

description: The POSSTR function returns the starting position of the first occurrence of one string (called the search-string) within another string (called the source-string).
sample:
SELECT RECEIVED, SUBJECT, POSSTR(NOTE_TEXT, 'GOOD BEER')
     FROM IN_TRAY
     WHERE POSSTR(NOTE_TEXT, 'GOOD BEER') <> 0
